content.raw:
I think it is a good idea to add a vehicle namespace.  

A little investigation shows that the spawn\_model script already has support for a “robot\_namespace” parameter that can allow a custom name to be applied for each spawned model.  Brian used this in a launch script for testing wave effects:

[#!/osrf/vrx/src/default/wave\_gazebo/launch/wave\_wamv.launch](#!/osrf/vrx/src/default/wave_gazebo/launch/wave_wamv.launch)

Unfortunately, the way I did this originally forced the topics to be named absolutely.  I have updated the topic name generation and added a robot\_namespace parameter to my branch so that the vrx.launch file so that it should now correctly spawn in the “wamv” namespace.

Regards,

Jonathan.
